data.text: @SteveKerfoot In an ideal world I’d like it injected into my bronchopulmonary lymph node please 😎
@SteveKerfoot OK thanks for the tip. Saves me from deciding to get it in the upper or lower.

@MBBoffa Neither would be a good place to get a vaccine, FYI (hope you're not disappointed)

Still might be a slightly better choice than the eye though.

We very much appreciate your enthusiasm and support, but please pick a different delicate body part with which to prove your vaccine allegiance (but maybe not the brain, and prob not your testicle either if you have one).

Signed, 
An Immunologist
Saying that you want the vaccine sooo bad that you'd take it in the eye;...  this is might be the worst possible place to get a vaccine if you want to generate a protective response.
